attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you agree to have a more open and accountable government. Sign This petition. We feel this country is loosing its democracy. We as a free country and people should have the right to hold the government more accountable when decisions made by the government go wrong. 

This doesn't reflect on any party. In a sense this relates to any party in power, that should listen to its people

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
